item.description:
Learn Salsa!


9:00-10:00 Beginner & Intermed. Salsa Lessons
No Partner Required
Beginners Very Welcome.  No partner required... or bring a date... or bring a friend(s).   Relaxed Ballroom environment. Music by DJ Sonerito

10:00-2am Dance Party  

21+. $12. Full Bar.
Admission includes lesson, party, coat check, etc.

Dress Code: Pretty much anything from smart casual to funky casual to simply elegant. 

***********************************

Friday Night Salsa is Boston's salsa hot spot featuring salsa dancing and lessons with Salsa y Control, regular performances, and an amazing venue filled with 300+ welcoming salsa dancers. Friday Night Salsa has it all, including: a 5400 square foot ballroom, a raised performance stage, club lighting and sound, a reasonably priced full bar ($4-5 beer, $5-7 mixed drink, etc), an inexpensive parking garage next door, and public transport on Mass Ave. (Red Line, Buses 1, 64 etc.) one block away! Click here for map.

Click here to see a video of the Friday Night Salsa Experience!

Driving Directions: Take Storrow or Memorial Drive to River St. (where the two gas stations are), then a right on Mass Ave, a right on Pearl St (where FootLocker and Putnam Furniture is), and your first right on Green St.
item.how_to_find_us: Nos encontraremos en el segundo piso donde esta el salon de baile, despues de la entrada donde se paga la admision
item.why: Podemos divertirnos aprendiendo a bailar musica en espa√±ol. Edgar sugirio un buen lugar en Cambridge donde dan lecciones de salsa y despues se baila. Es relajado y no hace falta tener experiencia. http://havanaclubsalsa.com/salsa_fridays.shtml

group.name: The MetroWest-Greater Boston Castellano Speakers Group

item.name: Vamos a bailar Salsa!
